what is a racial literacy thank you for

racially stressful encounter reading
involves recognizing when a racial

taking mindfulness and reducing my
tsunami interpretation of this moment

being able to make a healthy decision
that is not an under reaction where I

using a mindfulness strategy we call

exhale stay with me calculate ask what

several research and therapy

safely reduce the sexual risk in their
partner relationships and the other to

teach teachers how to read recast and
resolve stressful moments in the
classroom and a final project in which

children separately to understand their
racial traumas before we bring them
